description:
Email is the #1 medium for business communication and therefore new technologies, strategies, and tactics are needed to adapt to this new paradigm. This course shows you how to use automated email to explode the sales & growth of your business/startup.

I have used these exact tactics to close deals with the biggest brands in the world including Rosetta Stone, Hulu, Shutterstock, & NBC.

Using automated outbound email, ToutApp, and the predictable revenue methodology has allowed me to scale my startups revenue from $100K/month to $1.5M/month in less than 2 years.
title: Automated Outbound Email for Sales & Growth Hackers
